oauth2.usage:
Usage: myecl [OPTION]
  login     Sign in with OAuth provider.
            On the first time, links your OAuth provider account to your Minecraft account.
  unlink    Unlink your Minecraft account from your OAuth provider account.
  info      Show information about your linked OAuth2 account.
oauth2.info: <blue>Your account is linked to OAuth2 provider account [OAuth2AccountUsername] ([OAuth2Id])</blue>
oauth2.noperms: <red>You don't have permission to use this command.</red>
